title: Maximum 40% of total proposed Built-up area (excluding parking area) inclusive of such additional F
clause_text: Maximum 40% of total proposed Built-up area (excluding parking area) inclusive of such additional F.S.I. may be permitted for support services in IT Parks in Municipal Corporations which are not covered under Serial No. c) above and remaining built-up area shall be utilized for IT/ITES.
